description.value:
Ammunition any

Carved with stylized images of water or aquatic life, depth charges that are fired underwater or at a submerged target function with their normal range increments and can hit no matter their normal damage type. This ammunition explodes if it hits a target underwater, dealing @Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage in a @Template[burst|distance:20] @Check[fortitude|dc:24|basic|showDC:all|options:area-effect] according to its type. This burst doesn't extend out of the water.
